scene_description_enriched: A knight in full armor, identified by his halo and the red cross on his surcoat, rides a white horse across a green landscape. He is depicted in the act of slaying a golden dragon, which lies defeated on the ground, its mouth open and a spear or lance piercing it. In the background, a golden building with a prominent tower and arched windows is visible amidst rolling hills and trees. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
